creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: Woman in full skirt enters through gate; chickens and building with thatched roof behind her; small gold frame
inscription:
Signature; Inscriptions

Inscribed in pencil, lower margin: [Femme a la barriere].

Inscribed in pencil, LLC: [L.D. 84]
provenance: Bruce B. and Ruth Dayton, Wayzata, Minn. (until 2010; given to MIA)
text: This small, quiet etching is typical of the loving observation that Pissarro brought to rural life.
title: Woman at the Gate
